entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending before morning then mainly cloudy. Risk of snow squalls late this evening and after midnight. Local blowing snow late this evening and after midnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Clearing. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
